chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
T: Type
U: CompleteSpace

Goal:
forall F1 F2 : ((T -> U) -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim_fct F1) (lim_fct F2)

Premises:
filter_le = fun (T : Type) (F G : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall P : T -> Prop, G P -> F P : forall T : Type, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope]
Inductive t : nat -> Set := F1 : forall n : nat, Fin.t (S n) | FS : forall n : nat, Fin.t n -> Fin.t (S n) For F1: Argument n is implicit and maximally inserted For FS: Argument n is implicit and maximally inserted For t: Argument scope is [nat_scope] For F1: Argument scope is [nat_scope] For FS: Argument scopes are [nat_scope _]
lim_fct = fun (F : ((T -> U) -> Prop) -> Prop) (t : T) => lim (fun P : U -> Prop => F (fun g : T -> U => P (g t))) : (((T -> U) -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> U Argument scopes are [function_scope _]
close = fun (M : UniformSpace) (x y : M) => forall eps : posreal, ball x eps y : forall M : UniformSpace, M -> M -> Prop Argument M is implicit and maximally inserted
close_lim : forall F1 F2 : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim F1) (lim F2) where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- CompleteSpace]
CompleteSpace.Mixin : forall (T : UniformSpace) (lim : ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T), (forall F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps)) -> (forall F1 F2 : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim F1) (lim F2)) -> CompleteSpace.mixin_of T
CompleteSpace.ax2 : forall (T : UniformSpace) (m : CompleteSpace.mixin_of T) (F1 F2 : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (CompleteSpace.lim T m F1) (CompleteSpace.lim T m F2)
Record mixin_of (T : UniformSpace) : Type := Mixin { lim : ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T; ax1 : forall F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps); ax2 : forall F1 F2 : (T -> Prop) -> Prop, filter_le F1 F2 -> filter_le F2 F1 -> close (lim F1) (lim F2) } For Mixin: Argument scopes are [_ function_scope function_scope function_scope]
complete_cauchy_fct : forall F : ((T -> U) -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> (forall eps : posreal, exists f : T -> U, F (ball f eps)) -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim_fct F) eps)
filterlim = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermap f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_le_trans : forall (T : Type) (F G H : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F G -> filter_le G H -> filter_le F H
filterlimi_filter_le_1 : forall f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop, filter_le ?G ?F -> filterlimi f ?F ?H -> filterlimi f ?G ?H where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop]
filterlimi_filter_le_2 : forall f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop, filter_le ?G ?H -> filterlimi f ?F ?G -> filterlimi f ?F ?H where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop]
filterlimi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (G : (U -> Prop) -> Prop) => filter_le (filtermapi f F) G : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> ((U -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_le_refl : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), filter_le F F
filtermap = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => P (f x)) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
is_filter_lim_filter_le : forall x : ?T, filter_le ?G ?F -> is_filter_lim ?F x -> is_filter_lim ?G x where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop]
filterlim_filter_le_2 : forall f : ?T -> ?U, filter_le ?G ?H -> filterlim f ?F ?G -> filterlim f ?F ?H where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop]
filterlim_filter_le_1 : forall f : ?T -> ?U, filter_le ?G ?F -> filterlim f ?F ?H -> filterlim f ?G ?H where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?U : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?G : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?H : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop]
iota_correct_weak : forall P : ?T -> Prop, (forall x y : ?T, P x -> P y -> close x y) -> forall x : ?T, P x -> close (iota P) x where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- CompleteSpace]
CompleteSpace.lim : forall T : UniformSpace, CompleteSpace.mixin_of T -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T
is_filter_lim = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (x : T) => forall P : T -> Prop, locally x P -> F P : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope _]
filter_le_within : forall D : ?T -> Type, filter_le (within D ?F) ?F where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
filtermap_proper_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), ProperFilter F -> ProperFilter (filtermap f F)
filtermap_filter : forall (T U : Type) (f : T -> U) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), Filter F -> Filter (filtermap f F)
complete_cauchy : forall F : (?T -> Prop) -> Prop, ProperFilter F -> cauchy F -> forall eps : posreal, F (ball (lim F) eps) where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- CompleteSpace]
within = fun (T : Type) (D : T -> Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : T -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => D x -> P x) : forall T : Type, (T -> Type) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (T -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
filter_imp : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x -> Q x) -> ?F P -> ?F Q where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
lim = fun T : CompleteSpace => CompleteSpace.lim (UniformSpace.Pack T (CompleteSpace.class T) T) (CompleteSpace.class T) : forall T : CompleteSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
close_trans : forall x y z : ?M, close x y -> close y z -> close x z where ?M : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace]
filtermapi = fun (T U : Type) (f : T -> U -> Prop) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) (P : U -> Prop) => F (fun x : T => exists y : U, f x y /\ P y) : forall T U : Type, (T -> U -> Prop) -> ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> (U -> Prop) -> Prop Arguments T, U are implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
cauchy = fun (T : UniformSpace) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists x : T, F (ball x eps) : forall T : UniformSpace, ((T -> Prop) -> Prop) -> Prop Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [_ function_scope]
close_iota : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, (forall x : ?T, P x <-> Q x) -> close (iota P) (iota Q) where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- CompleteSpace]
Build_ProperFilter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), (forall P : T -> Prop, F P -> exists x : T, P x) -> Filter F -> ProperFilter F
fct_UniformSpace = fun (T : Type) (U : UniformSpace) => UniformSpace.Pack (T -> U) (fct_UniformSpace_mixin T U) (T -> U) : Type -> UniformSpace -> UniformSpace Argument scopes are [type_scope _]
filter_and : forall P Q : ?T -> Prop, ?F P -> ?F Q -> ?F (fun x : ?T => P x /\ Q x) where ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Type] ?F : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- (?T -> Prop) -> Prop] ?Filter : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- Filter ?F]
filterlimi_locally_close : forall (f : ?T -> ?U -> Prop) (l l' : ?U), at_point ?a (fun x : ?T => forall y1 y2 : ?U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2) -> filterlimi f (at_point ?a) (locally l) -> filterlimi f (at_point ?a) (locally l') -> close l l' where ?U : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?a : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
Build_Filter : forall (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop), F (fun _ : T => True) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x)) -> (forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q) -> Filter F
positive_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~1)%positive) -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (p~0)%positive) -> P 1%positive -> forall p : positive, P p
nat_ind : forall P : nat -> Prop, P 0%nat -> (forall n : nat, P n -> P (S n)) -> forall n : nat, P n
close_sym : forall x y : ?M, close x y -> close y x where ?M : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace]
filterlimi_locally_cauchy : forall f : T -> U -> Prop, filtermap ?f (at_point ?a) (fun x : T => (exists y : U, f x y) /\ (forall y1 y2 : U, f x y1 -> f x y2 -> y1 = y2)) -> (forall eps : posreal, exists P : T -> Prop, filtermap ?f (at_point ?a) P /\ (forall u v : T, P u -> P v -> forall u' v' : U, f u u' -> f v v' -> ball u' eps v')) < -> (exists y : U, filterlimi f (filtermap ?f (at_point ?a)) (locally y)) where ?f : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- ?T -> T] ?T : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace] ?a : [T : Type U : CompleteSpace |- UniformSpace.sort ?T]
Record Filter (T : Type) (F : (T -> Prop) -> Prop) : Prop := Build_Filter { filter_true : F (fun _ : T => True); filter_and : forall P Q : T -> Prop, F P -> F Q -> F (fun x : T => P x /\ Q x); filter_imp : forall P Q : T -> Prop, (forall x : T, P x -> Q x) -> F P -> F Q } For Filter: Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted For Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Build_Filter: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ function_scope function_scope]
CompleteSpace.Pack : forall sort : Type, CompleteSpace.class_of sort -> Type -> CompleteSpace

```coq
intros F1 F2 H1 H2.
apply close_lim.
- apply H1.
- apply H2.
Qed.
```
